name: Cactus Jumper
description: Think you got what it takes to cross the deadly sands? The heat is on in this addicting desert side scroller! Using simple 3-button controls, try and jump as far as you can, plan your next moves and avoid those prickly cacti!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Direct X9 Storage: 200 MB available space
